com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses

Class HISunburst

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses.HISeries
      • com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses.HISunburst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HIChartsJSONSerializable

    public class HISunburst
extends HISeries
    description: A sunburst series. If the type option is not specified, it is inherited from chart.type. For options that apply to multiple series, it is recommended to add them to the plotOptions.series options structure. To apply to all series of this specific type, apply it to plotOptions. sunburst.

    • Field Detail

      • borderColor

        public HIColor borderColor
        description: The color of the border surrounding each slice. When null, the border takes the same color as the slice fill. This can be used together with a borderWidth to fill drawing gaps created by antialiazing artefacts in borderless pies. In styled mode, the border stroke is given in the .highcharts-point class. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/pie-bordercolor-black/ : Black border default: #ffffff

      • size

        public java.lang.Object size
        description: The diameter of the pie relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage or pixel value. Pixel values are given as integers. The default behaviour (as of 3.0) is to scale to the plot area and give room for data labels within the plot area. As a consequence, the size of the pie may vary when points are updated and data labels more around. In that case it is best to set a fixed value, for example "75%". demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/pie-size/ : Smaller pie

      • rootId

        public java.lang.String rootId
        description: Which point to use as a root in the visualization. default: undefined

      • startAngle

        public java.lang.Number startAngle
        description: The start angle of the pie slices in degrees where 0 is top and 90 right. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/pie-startangle-90/ : Start from right default: 0

      • levels

        public java.util.ArrayList<HILevels> levels
        description: Set options on specific levels. Takes precedence over series options, but not point options. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/demo/sunburst : Sunburst chart

      • levelIsConstant

        public java.lang.Boolean levelIsConstant
        description: Used together with the levels and allowDrillToNode options. When set to false the first level visible when drilling is considered to be level one. Otherwise the level will be the same as the tree structure. default: True

      • colors

        public java.util.ArrayList<HIColor> colors
        description: A series specific or series type specific color set to use instead of the global colors. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/demo/pie-monochrome/ : Set default colors for all pies

      • allowDrillToNode

        public java.lang.Boolean allowDrillToNode
        description: When enabled the user can click on a point which is a parent and zoom in on its children. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/demo/sunburst : Allow drill to node default: false
